title: Purple cheongsam with gold trimming and floral motif
content:
accession_no_csv: 2016-00171

  Image: 

  object_work_type: womenswear folk costume

  title_text: Purple cheongsam with gold trimming and floral motif

  preference: main

  shape: irregular

  materials_name: silk (textile) piping (trimming)

  techniques_name: piping (process) machine sewing (technique)

  object_colour: multicoloured

  physical_appearance: This is a long-sleeved cheongsam that is predominantly purple in colour. The trimming is gold and the piping is turquoise in colour. There are floral patterns all over the cheongsam. There is a collar present as well. The cheongsam does not look worn out and there are no visible tears on it. There is also a slit on the right side of the costume.

  subject_terms_1: geometric motifs floral patterns dtresses (garments)

  subject_terms_2: Motifs Women\u0027s clothing Qipao Ethnic costume

  subject_terms_3: Ethnic costume Chinese costume

  sgcool_label_text: This ankle-length cheongsam with long sleeves has gold trimming and turquoise piping. The cheongsam also has turquoise floral and geometric motifs. The joints slightly visible at the centre front and back of the cheongsam reveal that it was likely made in the early 20th century as the width of the fabric then had limitations.

The joints slightly visible at the centre front and back of the cheongsam reveal that it was likely made in the early 20th century as the width of the fabric then had limitations.
